parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can query the application ID by calling the ListApplications operation.

parameters.name: RescaleLevel
parameters.description:
The level of resource scaling. The value must be of the enumerated data type. Valid values:

*   AreaIspCode (default): scales resources based on the Internet service provider (ISP).
*   RegionId: scales resources based on the edge node.
*   InstanceId: scales resources based on the instance ID. Resource scale-out specifies resource hosting and scale-in specifies resource release.

parameters.name: RescaleType
parameters.description:
The scaling operation. The value must be of the enumerated data type. Valid values:

*   Add: adds new resources.
*   Del: releases resources.

parameters.name: ResourceSelector
parameters.description: The required resources. The value must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout period for asynchronous scaling. Unit: seconds. Default value: 300.

parameters.name: ToAppVersion
parameters.description: The version number of the application deployment package. By default, the stable version number is used. This parameter takes effect only when you perform resource scale-out.
